#summary Initial values of x86 registers
=Initial values=
this page gathers the initial values of x86 registers:
 * general registers, at specific execution points
 * special registers

Note: some values may change slightly, depending on your exact configuration and settings.

The values on this page have been dumped with [http://code.google.com/p/corkami/downloads/list?can=2&q=registers+dumper regdump].

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

=Common=
(under construction)

Slide from [http://code.google.com/p/corkami/wiki/BerlinSidesX2?show=   content BerlinSide's presentation]
https://corkami.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pics/bsx2/img40.png

PoC `initvals.exe` downloadable [http://xchg.info/corkami/latest/asm.rar here]
==Flags==
always 246 (except NT4 EP), on !EntryPoint or TLS.

==Selectors==
Standard for 32b:
|| CS || DS || ES || FS || SS || GS ||
|| 001B || 0023 || 0023 || 003B || 0023 ||0000 ||

Exception: FS is `38` under NT4/2k/XPSP1, but `3B` on any XP sp>=2/Vista/7

for 64b (CPU, not OS => even on 32b os on 64b cpu):
|| CS || DS || ES || FS || SS || GS ||
||23||2B||2B||53||2B||2B||

==Registers==
 * at Entrypoint:
  * XP or older ? EAX = 0
  * Vista or more recent ? EAX = 7xxxxxxxxh

 * TLS
  * ECX = `DataDirectory[TLS].size`

 * STR
  * CPU = 64b ? 40h
  * CPU = 32b ? 28h

=Wine=
tested under Debian

Detect Wine:
 * GS (3B/6B)
 * FS (33/63)
 * CR0 (80050033)
 * ...
